title: 1.12.2版本的生长工艺mod和R键整理，工业时代2实验版冲突。求解决方法或者意见。
author: 柯丽敏
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----

WARNING: coremods are present:
  Inventory Tweaks Coremod (R键整理InventoryTweaks-1.63.jar)
Contact their authors BEFORE contacting forge

// This is a token for 1 free hug. Redeem at your nearest Mojangsta: [~~HUG~~]

Time: 6/9/18 12:18 PM

replies.author: 6B不止铅笔
replies.txt_content:
Caused by: ic2.core.util.Config$ParseException: generic parse error at line 99 (Fluid:water = minecraft:snow).将ic2本体用压缩软件打开，把上述文件里的Fluid:water = minecraft:snow改成Fluid:water = minecraft:water试试

使用这个打开class文件：https://pan.baidu.com/s/1NldRvWohACHRt3tjaHtx6Q 密码: 9r1u

replies.author: 柯丽敏
replies.txt_content:
萝卜冲刺 发表于 2018-6-9 14:57
将ic2本体用压缩软件打开，把上述文件里的Fluid:water = minecraft:snow改成Fluid:water = minecraft:water ...
可以再分享一下软件吗？
